title: A Conversation With PepsiCo C.E.O. Indra Nooyi (Ep. 316 Update)
description: One of the world’s biggest and best-known companies just announced that its C.E.O. would be stepping down in the fall. We interviewed her as part of our series “The Secret Life of a C.E.O.," and we thought you might like to hear that episode again, or for the first time if you missed it back then.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
